about_the_game:
Treat your customers with the Sweet Bundle!

This Bundle contains:

300 Spoons to help you upgrade your kitchen equipment;

1 +3 customers boost, so you have people to serve when it counts;

1 Price Doubler boost that helps you earn more coins;

1 Waiter boost that helps serve your dishes automatically to keep your hands free to cook;

1 Insta-Cook boost to make your meals in a flash;

1 Burn-Proofer boost that keeps your food looking fresh if you leave it cooking for too long;

1 Dazzler boost that can stop everything when the going gets rough.

The Sweet Bundle is a sure way to leave your customers feeling satisfied!

The Sweet Bundle is a sure way to leave your customers feeling satisfied!
name: Cooking Craze - Sweet Bundle
short_description: The Sweet Bundle includes 7 boosts and a load of spoons to leave the mouths of your customers watering for more!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
